sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RESTORATIVE in medicine, a remedy proper for reftoring and retrieving the ſtrength and vigour both of the body and animal ſpirits.
All under this claſs, fays Quincy, are rather nutri-mental than medicinal ; and are more adminiſtered to repair the waſtes of the conſtitution, than to alter and rectify its diſorders.
